title: Intel plans major job cuts and billions in savings as profits plummet
description: Chip giant anticipates a “meaningful number” of layoffs as part of multi-billion dollar cost-cutting measures.

title: Want to protect yourself? Install Chrome 107 now
description: Alongside the slew of fixes, the latest version of Chrome rolls out support for HEVC, joining the likes of Safari.

title: Interpol says the metaverse could open up a whole new world of crime
description: Terrorists could use the metaverse to plan future attacks in the physical plain, law enforcement warns.

title: Apple has launched a brand new security hub to help spot bugs and flaws
description: Apple Security Research launches with improved bounty systems.

title: AWS warns customer cloud demand is slowing as Amazon results stutter
description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) sses weakest results since it began reporting its results separately.

title: An Amazon Prime Video server packed with viewer data was exposed online
description: Amazon says server was quickly secured, and no login or payment details were exposed.

title: The Nintendo Switch can't handle Call of Duty
description: Xbox boss Phil Spencer wants to bring Call of Duty to the Switch – but it’s not a great idea.

title: Adobe’s controversial color scheme hits creatives hard
description: Adobe subscribers now need extra license just to access colors.

title: Move over Netflix, Disney Plus will be the home of the best Death Note adaptation
description: For its 33rd Treehouse of Horror episode, The Simpsons will be parodying hit anime and manga series Death Note.

title: iOS 16.1 bug that randomly drops Wi-Fi has iPhone owners tearing hair out
description: This sounds like a frustrating bug for those affected, and there seem to be quite a number of complaints online.

title: Bitdefender wants to help secure your office printer
description: Bitdefender will now work with certain Sharp MFP models to protect users and companies against malware.

title: Frontier is ending support for F1 Manager 2022 before the F1 season is even over
description: Updates for F1 Manager 2022 will come to an end as Frontier looks to work on future titles, and fans haven’t taken this well.

title: Microsoft: don't reset your Server Manager disk, you could lose all your data
description: Microsoft has issued a workaround, but it’s unclear as to when a patch will arrive.

title: 8 new movies and TV shows on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max and more this weekend (October 28)
description: From returning Emmy award-winners to slow-burning murder mysteries, there’s plenty to watch this weekend.

title: The hardware supercharging video conferencing
description: Video conferencing is here to stay, so how can you make sure your setup is the best it can be?

title: Twilio reveals it was hit by another data breach
description: A different approach by the same threat actor meant Twilio suffered the same result.

title: AMD RDNA 3 GPUs could be delayed – but don’t panic
description: Rumors are swirling about the on-sale date of AMD’s next-gen graphics cards.

title: Ransomware attacks are hitting heavy industry where it hurts - the wallet
description: Hackers demanding high payouts from manufacturing firms, but the industry is holding strong.

title: Google Cloud wants to help Web3 developers build on the blockchain
description: Google wants to (sort of) centralize your decentralized blockchain platforms - saving you time and money.

title: OLED TVs are in trouble – but that could be good news for cheaper prices
description: Interest in OLED TV is way down, so the companies are going to have to do something big to turn it around

title: The iPhone 15 Pro might be the first iPhone with no physical buttons
description: Apple is reportedly looking to replace mechanical buttons from the iPhone 15 Pro with solid-state inputs.

title: As Xbox Game Pass misses targets, Phil Spencer warns of Xbox price hikes
description: Phil Spencer says that an Xbox price hike is on the cards, though it won't hit before Christmas.

title: Wakanda Forever reactions are in, and it's "very different" to Black Panther
description: Early viewings of the Black Panther sequel call it "epic," "soulful," and "different".

title: Nvidia RTX 3060 series gets a facelift from Colorful in new launch
description: Colorful debuts its updated RTX 3060 series GPUs with quirky designs and a fair price point.

title: Windows 10’s latest patch breaks OneDrive – but a fix is coming
description: Microsoft’s patch applies important security fixes, but also torpedoes OneDrive in some cases.

title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra to offer huge night photography improvements
description: A leaker claims the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra will excel for low light photos and videos, with telephoto shots also improving.

title: Windows 11’s best new feature will only be for Samsung phone owners
description: Another Phone Link feature is exclusive to Samsung, but hopefully instant hotspot won’t stay that way.

title: Galaxy S22 update lets you take better pictures of, well, the galaxy
description: In an effort to outdo rivals, Samsung boosts night photography on flagship line.

title: DJI’s cheaper Mavic drone is nearly here – and I might regret buying the Mini 3 Pro
description: DJI has revealed a teaser for its next big launch – and the rumors suggest it could be cheaper version of its flagship drone.

title: Elon finally gets his Musk all over Twitter with confirmed acquisition
description: Elon Musk's $44 billion acquisition of Twitter has been finalised, with the tech entrepreneur hinting at changes to come for the platform
